fields.customfield_18110:
•	Scope: Changes resulting from any clarification, additions, or revisions to the project scope after the initial specifications have been approved
•	Design / Approach: Change in technical approach to the project, for instance what platform to leverage. 
•	Engineering: Change in platforming direction, including use of existing / new resources, availability level, license quantities, etc. Any change that arises exclusively because of a change in technology strategy, including misunderstandings of the scope
•	Plan: Any/all changes to the plan of attack, labor strategy, including delays, estimate changes, milestone changes, since the last published forecast. Changes resulting from improper, incomplete, inadequate estimates for the same scope of work and direction.
•	Operations: Any/all changes in the operating expectations for the technology in operation.
•	External: Change or failure on the part of an external party, or force majeure
•	Staffing / Labor: Changes resulting from any staffing issue, including resignations, poor contracting quality, competency issues, etc.

fields.description:
*Description:* 

This release addresses changes general bug fixes.

*Overview of the Release or Issue that we are fixing, Impact, Risks (if any).*
 # Added culture keys for info banner
 # FTC changes for my-trips
 # UI - Profile - Adoption of Email to Text custom email validator
 # UI - MyTrips - Adoption of Email to Text custom email validator

*Same activity, we have to perform at site manager on Stage and Prod env.*

Risks (if any) - NA

*Communication plan via email etc*

An email notification will be sent.

*Release Manager / Primary and Secondary Contact:*

Primary: [~D643542]

Secondary:[Sajel Goel|https://jira.cxloyalty.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=I767421]   [~O773286] 

*Release Downtime? (if any)*

No
